description: Number of hyperplanes spanned by the vertices of an n-cube that cover exactly n vertices.
references: O. Aichholzer and F. Aurenhammer, Classifying Hyperplanes in Hypercubes, 10th European Workshop on Computational Geometry, Santander, Spain, March 1994.
links: O. Aichholzer and F. Aurenhammer, Classifying hyperplanes in hypercubes, SIAM J. Discrete Math, Vol. 9, 1996, 225-232. DOI: 10.1137/S089548019426348X
author: Oswin Aichholzer (oaich(AT)igi.tu-graz.ac.at)
